description: Tyrants of the Nine Hells. 1 5 STRATEGIES AND TACTICS ASPECTS OF SEKOLAH IN EBERRON Aspects of Sekolah fight like sharks, though with Aspects of Sekolah appear only in the sahuagin-filled cunning and intelligence. An aspect of Sekolah uses seas near Xen’drik, if they appear at all. unholy blight or horrid wilting to soften up a group of ASPECTS OF SEKOLAH IN FAERÛN foes, and then charges to snatch one and swim away. It makes full use of its feats, especially sahuagin flip Aspects of Sekolah almost never appear in Faerûn, combined with grappling. though they are not unheard-of. Sekolah rarely inter- acts with his worshipers, but if he does he sends an SAMPLE ENCOUNTERS aspect rather than coming himself. It is rare to meet an aspect of Sekolah at all, since ASPECT OF GLASYA Sekolah has little to do with his worshipers. When one does, the aspect is usually in the company of sahuagin The coppery skin, wings, and horns on this devil don’t detract and/or sharks. in any way from her unearthly beauty. description: Hordes of the Abyss, which is packed full of information on demons and demon lords and how to use all this nastiness in your campaign. The chapter on demon lords mentions aspects of the demon lords as FIENDISH more common foes than the demon lords themselves, but few aspects are presented in the book since the ASPECTS designers put so many other useful things in that tome. Well, that is where this little guide comes in. In A Web Enhancement for Fiendish this combined edition of Fiendish Aspects, you’ll meet eleven aspects of demon lords, all suitable for mid-
name: Fiendish Codex I
